title: Geforce Experience
body: This app keep claiming that it would be optimal to turn on anti aliasing, vertical sync and play at the highest setting. Lately I've been facing a weird lag in commands were they seem to come out a little later than usual (with no ms or FPS spike at all). I'm always sitting at 155 FPS and 55 ms during high pressure sitautions. The best way I could describe this lag is when a slight delay always occurs when I hover my cursor over a hostile target (it usually takes a second for the cursor to turn into the sword). Any help would be appreciated.

replies.body:
Do you still encounter this delay if you undo the changes that *GeForce Experience* made to your League settings? If so, there may be some issues with your system's disk drive or League may be missing or full of corrupted files. I strongly recommend working through the steps in [this guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) if making those changes in GeForce Experience caused no change.

Let me know if those steps caused any change in your delay.
